name: BloodTransfusionAdministration
title: Blood Transfusion Administration
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent Blood Transfusion Administration.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use Quality Data Model (QDM) datatype related to the attribute procedure. The intent of this data element is to identify patients who had a blood transfusion administered.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with Blood Transfusion Administration of whole blood or packed red blood cell products.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts of Blood Transfusion Administration not relevant to whole blood or packed red blood cell products.)
